text: Guillermo García González and Yuri Balashov, 1979 in Rio de Janeiro Guillermo Garcia Gonzales (1953 in Santa Clara – 1990 in Havana) was a Cuban chess Grandmaster. ==External links== * Category:1953 births Category:1990 deaths Category:People from Santa Clara, Cuba Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Cuban chess players Category:20th-century chess players
title: Guillermo García González
